channel.title: FFMPEG Software on The Hosted Shop
channel.description: Recent content in FFMPEG Software on The Hosted Shop

item.title: Intel Hardware
item.description: Encode video Decode/Encode With QSV Filter Scaling Decode/Encode With QSV Filter Scaling And Set Bitrate Encode video ffmpeg -i input.wmv -c:v h264_qsv -c:a aac output.mp4 Decode/Encode With QSV Filter Scaling ffmpeg -y -hwaccel qsv -i input.mp4 -vf 'scale_qsv=w=1280:h=720' -c:v h264_qsv -c:a aac output.mp4 Decode/Encode With QSV Filter Scaling And Set Bitrate ffmpeg -hwaccel qsv -i input.mp4 -vf 'scale_qsv=w=1280:h=720' -c:v h264_qsv -c:a aac -b:v 3M output.mp4

item.title: Nvidia Hardware
item.description: Encode video Decode/Encode With NPP Filter Scaling Decode/Encode With Cuda Filter Scaling Decode/Encode With Cuda Filter Scaling And Set Bitrate Encode video ffmpeg -i input.wmv -c:v h264_nvenc -c:a aac output.mp4 Decode/Encode With NPP Filter Scaling ffmpeg -y -hwaccel cuda -hwaccel_output_format cuda -i input.ts -fps_mode passthrough -vf scale_npp=1280:720 -c:v h264_nvenc -c:a copy output.mp4 Decode/Encode With Cuda Filter Scaling ffmpeg -y -hwaccel cuda -hwaccel_output_format cuda -i input.mp4 -fps_mode passthrough -vf scale_cuda=1280:720 -c:v h264_nvenc -c:a copy output.
